author: Unity
description:
In this video, we look at how to use Cinemachine cameras for 2D games. You’ll learn how to limit camera movement using confiners, use trigger events for 2D camera zoom, and use the camera shake feature.

This is the third video in our five-part Cinemachine series. Watch the entire series here: https://on.unity.com/CinemachineTutorials

Links: 

Happy Harvest: https://on.unity.com/HappyHarvest

Cinemachine documentation: https://on.unity.com/CinemachineDoc

Time Stamps: 

00:00 Introduction
00:57 2D camera
03:32 Cinemachine confiner
05:41 Oversize window
07:35 Camera zoom
09:43 Trigger action
15:36 Cinemachine impulse
17:14 2D platformer
title: Cinemachine 2D Cameras
